sentences.en: ‘He lives here but works in London during the week.’ ‘Oh, I see (= I understand ) .’
sentences.cn: “他住在这里，但平时都在伦敦上班。”“噢，我明白了。”

sentences.en: "Ah, Captain Fox," Martin McGuinness said affably. "Nice to see you again."
sentences.cn: “啊，福克斯上尉，”马丁·麦吉尼斯亲切地说，“很高兴再次见到您。”

sentences.en: "I can't see it's any of your business," he raged.
sentences.cn: “这根本不关你的事，”他生气地说。

sentences.en: Can I see your ticket, please?
sentences.cn: 我能看看你的票吗？

sentences.en: Do you see the point I’m making (= do you understand what I’m trying to say ) ?
sentences.cn: 你明白我说的意思了吗？

sentences.en: Friends passed the word that the miners wanted to see him.
sentences.cn: 朋友们传话说矿工们想见他。

sentences.en: Have you seen Chris (= do you know where he is ) ?
sentences.cn: 你见过克里斯吗？

sentences.en: He could just about see the little man behind the counter.
sentences.cn: 他勉强能看到柜台后面的小个子男人。

sentences.en: He crouched down so he couldn’t be seen.
sentences.cn: 他蹲下来好让别人看不见他。

sentences.en: He'd phoned Laura to see if she was better.
sentences.cn: 他打电话给劳拉看她是不是好些了。

sentences.en: How are you Lennox? Good to see you up and about.
sentences.cn: 你怎么样，伦诺克斯？很高兴看到你能下床走动了。

sentences.en: I can’t see the point of (= I do not understand the reason for ) spending so much money on a car.
sentences.cn: 我看不出花这么多钱买一辆车有什么意义。

sentences.en: I don't see the point in it really. It's just stupid.
sentences.cn: 我真的不理解这到底有什么意义，简直是愚蠢透顶。

sentences.en: I no longer have any objection to your going to see her.
sentences.cn: 我不会再因为你去见她而不高兴。

sentences.en: I really don't see any reason for changing it.
sentences.cn: 我真的不明白为什么要改变它。

sentences.en: I saw the offer advertised in the newspaper.
sentences.cn: 我在报纸上看到这个减价的广告。

sentences.en: I see what you mean (= I understand what you are saying ) .
sentences.cn: 我明白你的意思。

sentences.en: I'm so glad to see you back where you belong.
sentences.cn: 我真高兴看到你又回到了属于你自己的天地。

sentences.en: Let me see, how old is he now?.
sentences.cn: 让我看看，他现在多大年纪？。

sentences.en: My eyes were so swollen I could hardly see.
sentences.cn: 我的眼睛肿得很厉害，几乎看不到东西。

sentences.en: Now let me see, who's the man we want?
sentences.cn: 现在让我看一看，谁是我们要找的人？

sentences.en: now see here, you're going to get it back for me!.
sentences.cn: 听着，你要把它给我弄回来！。

sentences.en: See our selection of autumn favourites and take your pick.
sentences.cn: 看看我们的秋季精选，然后挑出你想要的。

sentences.en: Specialists see various reasons for the recent surge in inflation.
sentences.cn: 专家们认为目前通货膨胀加剧有多种原因。

sentences.en: The accommodation was so awful it had to be seen to be believed (= you would not believe it if you did not see it yourself ) .
sentences.cn: 住宿条件太糟了，不是亲眼所见是不会相信的。

sentences.en: The criticisms will not stop people flocking to see the film.
sentences.cn: 批评的声音不会阻止人们涌到影院观看这部电影。

sentences.en: The moment we saw the house, we knew we wanted to buy it.
sentences.cn: 我们一看到这房子就知道我们要买。

sentences.en: The other officers laughed, but Nichols couldn’t see the joke .
sentences.cn: 其他警官都笑了，但尼科尔斯却听不懂有什么好笑。

sentences.en: this part of South London has seen better days.
sentences.cn: 南伦敦的这一片已经不如往昔了。

sentences.en: You mix the flour and eggs like this, see (= used to check that someone is listening and understands ) ?
sentences.cn: 你要这样搅拌面粉和鸡蛋，明白了吗？

sentences.en: You see, the thing is, I’m really busy right now (= used when you are explaining something ) .
sentences.cn: 你看，问题是我现在真的很忙。

phrases.phrase: as far as I can see

phrases.tran_cn: 正如你所看到的；你是知道的
经常和…在一起；经常见到

phrases.phrase: see a man about a dog
phrases.tran_cn: (幽默，婉)有点儿急事先行告辞

phrases.phrase: see eye to eye, see fit

phrases.tran_cn: [美国口语]听我说；喂(唤起对方注意或表示不赞成)
［用以强调某一陈述，命令，或表示抗议］看看；瞧瞧，听着

phrases.phrase: see one's way clear to do (或doing) something
phrases.tran_cn: 有可能做某事；方便做某事（常用于礼貌请求中）
(英, 非正式)［用于恶意的断然拒绝］看某人先倒霉，绝不
预见某事快要发生，准备应对某事（尤指坏事）
看中(或喜欢)某人的某个方面
再见；待会儿见；希望尽快见到你

trans.tran_cn: 主教教区，主教权限，牧座
[saw-seen] 看， 观看； 参见， 会晤； 领会， 理解； 想象； 把…看作； 发现； 体
trans.tran_en: to notice or examine someone or something, using your eyes

trans.tran_cn: 看（见），观看，了解，参见，拜访，确保
